00007 std::string join(std::string sep, std::vector<std::string> strs);
00008 
00009 class OrdersQueueImpl : public OrdersQueue {
00010 private:
00011         class Order {
00012         public:
00013                 std::string name;
00014                 Args args;
00015 
00016                 Order(std::string name, Args args) : name(name), args(args)
00017                 {       }
00018         };
00019 
00020         std::vector<Order> orders;
00021 public:
00022         virtual ~OrdersQueueImpl()
00023         {       }
00024 
00025         std::string getOrders()
00026         {
00027                 std::string ordStr;
00028                 std::vector<Order>::iterator i;
00029                 Args::iterator j;
00030                 // Concatenate all orders
00031                 for (i = orders.begin(); i != orders.end(); i++) {
00032                         // Name
00033                         ordStr += i->name;
00034                         ordStr += ' ';
00035                         // Args
00036                         ordStr += join(";", i->args);
00037                         // Newline
00038                         ordStr += '\n';
00039                 }
00040                 return ordStr;
00041         }
00042 
00043         void sendOrders(int fd)
00044         {
00045                 writeToSock(getOrders(), fd);
00046         }
00047 
00048         void add(std::string name)
00049         {
00050                 orders.push_back(Order(name, Args()));
00051         }
00052         void add(std::string name, std::string arg0)
00053         {
00054                 orders.push_back(Order(name, Args(1, arg0)));
00055         }
00056         void add(std::string name, std::string arg0, std::string arg1)
00057         {
00058                 orders.push_back(Order(name, Args()));
00059                 orders.back().args.push_back(arg0);
00060                 orders.back().args.push_back(arg1);
00061         }
00062         void add(std::string name, Args args)
00063         {
00064                 orders.push_back(Order(name, args));
00065         }
00066 };
